DOC.brief_summary: The investigators are looking for volunteers who have a history of Major Depressive Disorder, the Winter Blues, or Seasonal Affective Disorder or healthy volunteers who do not have a history of these disorders for a research study on genetics.
DOC.brief_title: Study of Genes in Relation to Seasonal Affective Disorder and Major Depressive Disorder
DOC.detailed_description: The investigators are looking for volunteers who have a history of Major Depressive Disorder, the Winter Blues, or Seasonal Affective Disorder or healthy volunteers who do not have a history of these disorders for a research study on genetics. Participation involves one 2-3 hour visit involving two diagnostic interviews, DNA collection, and questionnaires.
DOC.criteria: SAD or MDD healthy control drug or alcohol dependence Bipolar Disorder
